title: Coronavirus variant fear sparks Africa travel curbs
content:
1. Coronavirus variant fear sparks Africa travel curbs  BBC News
  2. New Coronavirus Variant a 'Serious Concern' in South Africa  Bloomberg
  3. Britain to Ban Flights From Six African Nations as Variant Identified  The New York Times
  4. Fears over “worst ever” Covid variant as UK bans flights from southern Africa - BBC News  BBC News
  5. WHO calls special meeting to discuss new Covid variant found in South Africa with 'a large number of mutations'  CNBC
